data.name: MMC_Tit10
data.value:
Right click on NetSqlAzMan node and choose 'Language' to choose preferred language.

Right click on NetSqlAzMan node and choose 'Storage connection' to set up Sql Server connection properties.

Notes:

First, you must create manually a Sql database (NetSqlAzManStorage) and execute NetSqlAzMan_SqlServer.sql script (NetSqlAzMan installation folder).

More info at http://netsqlazman.codeplex.com.
